A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I'm only a casual Star Wars fan so I usually chuckle at people who say things like a particular character\, story line\, or film 'ruined Star Wars for me'.

Well\, this film ruined Star Wars for me.

Man\, what a fiasco. There were a lot of cringe-worthy scenes. The whole Casino planet/code breaker story line? WTF was that!? Luke is a bitter prick? The ladies who command the rebels wear evening gowns? I could go on forever about how insanely ridiculous and flawed this movie is.

Bottom line is this. I don't know how many times I've seen the first trilogy\, and I've even re-watched the prequels a couple times. I will NEVER watch TLJ ever again. Not out of protest or because I feel betrayed by Disney. It was just a bad movie.
